name: Thrashinator
description:
Saturn blew up! The earth is trapped inside a everlasting asteroid rain. YOU, the best dragracer on the planet, are the only hope for humanity. You jump into the specially build spaceship to destroy the raining asteroids. How long will you last?

Gameplay:

If you hit the asteroids with the side of your ship, they will shatter into small pieces, that burn up in earths atmosphere. Try to get into a drifting flow to get all pieces before the bigger ones hit Earth.

W - accelerate, A and D rotate spaceship. Rotate your spaceship without boost to make even riskier manuvers.

R restarts the game.
